description:
Gerardo Carrera (Mabe Corporativo): "Data Science meets the Home Appliance Industry: How we bring modern analysis to this industry"
Fernanda Cobo (FUNSALUD): "AI as a tool to decrease health disparities: challenges and opportunities in LATAM"
José Gonzalo Rangel (Banorte-IXE Analytics): "AI + Analytics: the key to achieve customer-centricity in banking"
Eva Hernández Avilez (Initiatives for Sustainable Development): "AI, complex systems and data science for disruptive business models in Mexico"


Moderator: Jennifer Enciso (PROSPERiA)
title: Panel AI Applications In Latam Industry
